directions: [["Melt butter. Stir in brown sugar, corn syrup, corn syrup, and salt. "],["Boil for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in soda and vanilla. "],["Gradually pour over corn, mixing well.  "],["Bake at 250 degrees for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes: It is good not baked too.
